title: Swagger documentation not working with Quarkus 3
body:
### Describe the bug

I am trying to generate Swagger documentation for my Quarkus application, but I am getting the error java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/jboss/resteasy/core/messagebody/AsyncBufferedMessageBodyWriter. I have tried adding the quarkus-resteasy-reactive and quarkus-resteasy-jackson2-provider dependencies to my project, but the error still persists.

I have attached the logs from my Quarkus application.

### Expected behavior

The Swagger documentation should be generated and accessible at http://localhost:8080/swagger-ui/.


### Actual behavior

The Swagger documentation is not generated and I get the error java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/jboss/resteasy/core/messagebody/AsyncBufferedMessageBodyWriter.

### How to Reproduce?

Steps to reproduce:

-  Create a new Quarkus project.
- Add quarkus-smallrye-openapi
- Enable the Swagger UI by setting the quarkus.swagger-ui.enable property to true.
- Run your Quarkus application.

Reproducible with:

Quarkus version 3.1.3.Final
Gradle
Additional information:

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Darwin M-FQYYK371DH 22.5.0 Darwin Kernel Version 22.5.0: Mon Apr 24 20:52:24 PDT 2023; root:xnu-8796.121.2~5/RELEASE_ARM64_T6000 arm64

### Output of `java -version`

java 17.0.7 2023-04-18 LTS Java(TM) SE Runtime Environment (build 17.0.7+8-LTS-224) Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (build 17.0.7+8-LTS-224, mixed mode, sharing)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

 3.1.3.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Gradle 8.1.1

### Additional information

Logs:
